feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Celtics Lose Game 7, NBA Finals Are Set, Sixers and Bucks Hire Coaches, and Melo Retires - Season 2 Episode 29

link.title: Celtics Lose Game 7, NBA Finals Are Set, Sixers and Bucks Hire Coaches, and Melo Retires - Season 2 Episode 29

entry.content:
Noah and Jack have officially graduated, and now they’re back to discuss the latest in the NBA. Lots is going on, as Miami sent Boston packing and is now set to face Denver with a title on the line. They also talk about the latest coaching news across the league, and close out the show by honoring Syracuse and Knick legend Carmelo Anthony, who announced his retirement after a 19 year career.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Conference Finals Preview, Monty Williams Fired, Ja Morant, What’s Next for the Suns, Sixers and Warriors? - Season 2 Episode 28

link.title: Conference Finals Preview, Monty Williams Fired, Ja Morant, What’s Next for the Suns, Sixers and Warriors? - Season 2 Episode 28

entry.content:
And then there were 4…

Jack and Noah are back to discuss Lakers vs. Nuggets and Heat vs. Celtics, a conference finals repeat from the 2020 bubble. They also discuss the futures of Golden State, Phoenix, and Philly after second round exits, and another off-court incident regarding Ja Morant.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: 2nd Round Update, Bucks Say Goodbye to Bud - Season 2 Episode 27

link.title: 2nd Round Update, Bucks Say Goodbye to Bud - Season 2 Episode 27

entry.content:
Now that Noah can talk normally again, he and Jack are back to discuss the conference semifinals. Will the Lakers close out the Warriors? Do the Knicks have a chance to stay alive? And will the 76ers and Nuggets hold their 3-2 leads? They also talk about Milwaukee after firing Mike Budenholzer, and how that franchise moves forward with Giannis.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: 2023 NBA Playoffs Round 2 Thoughts and Predictions - Season 2 Episode 26

link.title: 2023 NBA Playoffs Round 2 Thoughts and Predictions - Season 2 Episode 26

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss all of the second round matchups in the NBA playoffs as the remaining eight teams compete for the NBA title. The guys also briefly discuss Dillon Brooks antics and how it possibly cost him a spot on the Memphis Grizzlies next season!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: A Crazy NBA Wednesday and First-Round Coverage - Season 2 Episode 25

link.title: A Crazy NBA Wednesday and First-Round Coverage - Season 2 Episode 25

entry.content:
After a wild Wednesday night of NBA playoff action, Noah and Jack break down the madness going on across the league. They discuss the Heat upsetting the Bucks, the Knicks winning their first playoff series in a decade, Kings-Warriors, Trae Young carrying the Hawks, Dillon Brooks vs. LeBron, and much more.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: It’s Play-In and Playoff Time! And Why Are the Timberwolves So Angry? - Season 2 Episode 23

link.title: It’s Play-In and Playoff Time! And Why Are the Timberwolves So Angry? - Season 2 Episode 23

entry.content:
The NBA playoffs are here! It’s one of the best times on the sports calendar, and Noah and Jack have got you covered. The guys this week analyze the play-in tournament and the four known first round series’. They also shut down the drama in Minnesota and the dysfunction in Dallas.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Western Conference Possibilities, Knicks vs Cavs Preview, Wiggins Return to Warriors, and Awards - Season 2 Episode 22

link.title: Western Conference Possibilities, Knicks vs Cavs Preview, Wiggins Return to Warriors, and Awards - Season 2 Episode 22

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss all the western conference playoff possibilities, as well as preview the first round matchup between the Knicks and Cavilers. They also discuss Andrew Wiggins returning to the warriors and they give their picks for all the regular season awards.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Lebron Returns, Dallas Struggles, Pelicans Red-hot and Final Standings Predictions - Season 2 Episode 21

link.title: Lebron Returns, Dallas Struggles, Pelicans Red-hot and Final Standings Predictions - Season 2 Episode 21

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the return of Lebron James and the Dallas Mavericks recent struggles and Luka Doncic being unhappy. The guys also discuss the Pelicans recent play and how Zion Williamson could impact them in the playoffs. Lastly they give their predictions on what the conference standings will be when the season ends.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Ja Morant out indefinitely, Clippers struggle, Steph Curry returns against the Lakers, Top of the East, Knicks Redhot, and KD debut - Season 2 Episode 20

link.title: Ja Morant out indefinitely, Clippers struggle, Steph Curry returns against the Lakers, Top of the East, Knicks Redhot, and KD debut - Season 2 Episode 20

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss Ja Morant’s recent actions, the Clippers 5 game losing streak. They also discuss Stephen Curry’s return as well as the top of the Eastern Conference. Finally they also discuss the Knicks 9 game winning streak and KD returning to the Phoenix Suns.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
